attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Everyday, millions of young people go to school and they all wear uniforms. However, how about making school uniform better, more comfortable, and a lot more attractive!! I mean some things just don't go together, like green skirts, brown jumpers and pink shirts. School would be cool if we could customise and personalise our unifom, or even have a uniform of which the colours match (but not clash!). If our uniform is cool, then we will want to learn!

rejection.details: This is a matter for individual schools and local authorities.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
